item.title: Project I: Text Mining on Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 Movie Script
item.description: Project Date: September 2021 - December 2021 Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 was the last episode of the legendary series. In this movie, Harry has finally grown into a steely lad on a mission to rid the world of evil, and the friends must search for the Horcruxes that keep the dastardly wizard immortal. Our research objectives in the project included studying the overall sentimental change as the story develops, comparing the word and sentiment between the two centers of the story - Harry and Voldemort, comparing the sentiment between the movie and the book, analyzing through the movie reviews to find if the movie was too dark compared to previous series.
